summary: Changes the Cultist armor from the Dragonborn DLC to Light armor.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]Mod requested by faffman on the Nexus forums.[/size]

[color=#f1c232][size=4][b][i]Requires Dragonborn DLC[/i][/b][/size][/color]

[size=3]Changes the Cultist Armor from the Dragonborn DLC to all Light Armor.[/size]

[size=3]All pieces are equal to Leather Armor in Armor and Weight. Value was left as default and should be equal or slightly higher than Leather Armor[/size]

[size=3]Tempering is available with a piece of leather and benefits from the Steel Smithing perk. (Should be compatible with any perk changes, does not touch the perk. As long as any changed perk uses the ArmorMaterialSteel keyword, it is fully compatible)[/size]

This mod also moves the Studded Armor into the Hide Category at the forge.

[color=#6aa84f][size=4][i]Compatibility:[/i][/size][/color]
[size=3]If you have a mod that alters the Studded Armor, simply place it after this in the load order and it will overwrite this change.[/size]
author: Himeki
